content.name: San Francisco Weather and News Reporter
content.description: An AISOP blueprint that searches for the latest weather and news in San Francisco and reports it.
content.summary: Searches for San Francisco weather and news.

blueprints.main:
graph TD
  A[Search Weather] --> B[Search News]
  B --> C[Reply with Information]
  C --> endNode((End))

C.step1: Summarize and reply with the weather and news information found in steps A and B.
